Description:
Ashampoo Burning Studio is a comprehensive tool for all CD, DVD and Blu-ray burning tasks. The main objective of this paid version faster, more powerful even better video editing capabilities for building and audio discs with the latest formats. Full HD video and HD are now fully compatible with Blu-ray, and all coding is in charge of Ashampoo Burning Studio. The integrated editor creates new DVD and Blu-ray video with menus designed automatically generated or self. Each menu page can use a different theme and background music. The new Autoplay Editor allows the user to create data discs interactive multi-page menus that start automatically. The menus, for example, include links to files or web pages. You can also create automatic startup disk without menus. Audio files and audio CDs are played directly from within Ashampoo Burning Studio.

features:

     * Burn files and folders to CD / DVD / Blu-Ray and add files and folders to existing discs
     * Multi-disk backup and restore on CD / DVD / Blu-Ray with compression and password protection
     * Create VideoCD and Super VideoCD
     * Rip music from audio CDs to MP3, WMA and WAV
     * Create audio CDs from WAV, MP3, FLAC, WMA and Ogg Vorbis
     * Create MP3 or WMA CD, DVD and Blu-ray discs or just copy music to CD, DVD or Blu-Ray
     * Copy CDs, DVDs and Blu-Ray
     * Create and burn disc images for CD, DVD and Blu-Ray
     * Quickly erase any rewritable media
     * Store disc images larger than 2GB on FAT32 file systems
     * Assistant interactive troubleshooting to resolve hardware problems and the media
     * Save project files so you can burn the same discs again later
